text: Ware ga Isuraeru no shison to, yakusoku o musunda toki no koto o omoiokose. (Sonotoki ware wa itta. ) `Anata gata wa arrā no soto ni, nanimono mo agamete wa naranai. Fubo ni kōyō o tsukushi, kinshin, minashigo, hinja o shinsetsu ni atsukai, hitobito ni yoi kotoba de hanashi, reihai no tsutome o mamori, sadame no kisha o shi nasai.'Daga, anata gata no naka shōsū no mono o nozoki, somuki satta
